headline.main: Giants Coach Alguacil Hit by Foul Ball, Has Broken Nose
headline.print_headline: Giants Coach Alguacil Hit by Foul Ball, Has Broken Nose

lead_paragraph: San Francisco Giants coach Jose Alguacil needed surgery to repair a broken nose after being hit by a foul ball during a spring training game.
snippet: San Francisco Giants coach Jose Alguacil needed surgery to repair a broken nose after being hit by a foul ball during a spring training game....
